# [Interview #811: JordanCon 2012 - Terez, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=811#5)

#### Question

Was there any significance to Cadsuane and Verin, two of the most important Aes Sedai, being from Far Madding?

#### Maria Simons

Not that I know of.
